arguments.argument:
draw_set_font(fConsole) if console_enabled { draw_set_alpha(0.5) draw_set_color(c_gray) draw_rectangle(0,0,room_width,16,0) draw_set_color(c_white) draw_set_alpha(1) draw_text(1,0,">"+keyboard_string) }
if error_occurred { draw_set_alpha(0.5) draw_set_color(c_gray) draw_roundrect(2,18,422,200,0) draw_set_color(c_white) draw_set_alpha(1) draw_text_ext(4,18,error_last,-1,420) }
